code: const questionsData=[{question:'Do you offer same-day delivery?',answer:'Yes! We offer same-day delivery across Los Angeles to ensure your flowers arrive fresh, beautiful, and exactly when you need them, making every moment easier.'},{question:'What are your delivery hours?',answer:'Our delivery service runs daily from 9AM to 6PM, so you can count on timely, reliable service every day, ensuring your flowers arrive fresh and beautifully presented.'},{question:'How much does delivery cost?',answer:'Delivery fees vary by location, but we keep it simple and affordable– and we also offer free delivery on all qualifying orders over $100 to make gifting even easier.'},{question:'Can I schedule the delivery date and time?',answer:'Absolutely. You can choose your preferred delivery date and time when placing your order directly with us, making it even easier to plan the perfect surprise.'},{question:'What happens if the recipient isn’t home?',answer:'If no one is available to receive the flowers, we’ll always do our best to leave them in a safe spot or contact the recipient to arrange a convenient time for redelivery.'},{question:'How can I contact you about my delivery?',answer:'You can call, email, or message us anytime. Visit our Contact page for all the ways to get in touch with our friendly, helpful team and get the support you need.'}];export default questionsData;
